scripts.releaseSandbox: pkg -t node8-linux-x64  src/app.js -o hotspotplus-coordinator;git commit -a -m 'sandbox:3.3';git tag -f release ;git push -u origin develop --tags --force
scripts.releaseProduction: pkg -t node8-linux-x64  src/app.js -o hotspotplus-coordinator;git commit -a -m 'production:3.3';git tag -f release ;git push -u origin master --tags --force
scripts.releaseLocalProduction: pkg -t node8-linux-x64  src/app.js -o hotspotplus-coordinator;git commit -a -m 'production:latest';git tag -f release ;git push -u origin master --tags --force
